name: DeployAdfFromArmTask
description: Deploys entire ADF (v2) from ARM template file (adftools)
author: Kamil Nowinski (SQLPlayer)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription to target for deployment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Resource Group.

inputs.name: DataFactoryName
inputs.label: Target Azure Data Factory Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the target Azure Data Factory

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Azure Region of target Data Factory.
It is used only in order to create new instance of ADF.

inputs.name: csmFile
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing to the Azure Resource Manager template. For more information about the templates see https://aka.ms/azuretemplates. To get started immediately use template https://aka.ms/sampletemplate.

inputs.name: csmParametersFile
inputs.label: Template parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing for the parameters file for the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: overrideParameters
inputs.label: Override template parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown:
To view the template parameters in a grid, click on “…” next to Override Parameters textbox. This feature requires that CORS rules are enabled at the source. Example,
–storageName fabrikam –adminUsername $(vmusername) -adminPassword $(password) –azureKeyVaultName $(fabrikamFibre).
If the parameter value you're using has multiple words, enclose them in quotes, even if you're passing them using variables. For example, -name "parameter value" -name2 "$(var)"
To override object type parameters use stringified JSON objects. For example, -options ["option1"] -map {"key1": "value1" }.

inputs.name: CreateNewInstance
inputs.label: Create new ADF instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether or not to create a new ADF if target instance doesn't exist yet.

inputs.name: StopStartTriggers
inputs.label: Stop/Start triggers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether or not to stop the triggers before beginning deployment and start them afterwards (via provided pre & post-deployment script).

inputs.name: DeployGlobalParams
inputs.label: Deploy Global Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether or not to deploy Global Parameters (via provided post-deployment script).

instanceNameFormat: ADF deployment from ARM Template files
